1.caption_en: The slide identifies who uses the Platform Innovation Kit (PIK)—entrepreneurs & startups, incumbent companies, intrapreneurs & corporate startups, incubators & accelerators, investors, and students & educators. Each entry briefly explains how the PIK supports growth, project success, platform strategy, investment decisions, and education.
1.caption_ru: The slide identifies who uses the Platform Innovation Kit (PIK)—entrepreneurs & startups, incumbent companies, intrapreneurs & corporate startups, incubators & accelerators, investors, and students & educators. Each entry briefly explains how the PIK supports growth, project success, platform strategy, investment decisions, and education.

3.caption_en:
A promotional header encouraging use of incubators and accelerators to improve project success by applying effective methodology and gaining visibility of life stages to achieve better program results.

{
  "type": "text_banner",
  "language": "en",

    "INCUBATORS & ACCELERATORS",
    "Improve the success of your projects",
    "by applying an effective methodology.",
    "Get visibility of the life stages and",
    "achieve better results of your program"
  ],
